name: Home stayed at local house.
description: You have a change to stay  at local house ,  Lach Villgage.  Of course  you have a change to  try  local  foods  which  are  made by local peoples,  or you  can make  the foods by your selves . The day after , we will show you around  Lach village, or hiking Langbiang mountain or  go to  the Tham Tham Waterfall tour..or we can go to other villages  up to the  requirement  of our travelers .The duration of the trip must  be  sometimes  at least two nights and three days or event more so we will charge you depend on the days  you stayed  with us .
